lead_paragraph: FIFA president Gianni Infantino says his plan to expand the World Cup soccer finals is less drastic than his critics suggest, and would create more excitement for fans, broadcasters and sponsors.

headline.print_headline: Infantino Says World Cup Plan Would Keep Dream Alive for More Teams
headline.main: Infantino Says World Cup Plan Would Keep Dream Alive for More Teams
